lead_paragraph: An article on Wednesday about an agreement on a new contract between the National Basketball Association and its referees union referred incorrectly to remarks made by David Stern, the league commissioner, to the news media in September. While Stern criticized the union, he did not “exchange insults” with the union’s lead negotiator, Lamell McMorris.
